mapper.update: insert into data_metrics_day (select null, a.user_id, a.server_tunnel_id, a.device_id, a.mapping_id, DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-01'), DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y'), sum(ifnull(a.bytes_in,0) + ifnull(a.bytes_out,0)), count(*), now() from data_metrics a WHERE a.create_date = DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY a.user_id, a.server_tunnel_id, a.device_id, a.mapping_id HAVING a.user_id is not null )
